articles.title: ESM244-HW1-Part1
articles.contents:
amph <- read_excel("sierra_amphibians.xlsx") %>% 
  drop_na() %>% 
  mutate(date = ymd(survey_date)) %>% 
  mutate(year = year(date)) %>% 
  select(-date) 

ramu <- amph %>% 
  filter(amphibian_species == "RAMU")

ramu_wo_egg <- ramu %>% 
  filter(amphibian_life_stage %in% c("SubAdult", "Tadpole", "Adult"))

ramu_wo_egg_sum <- ramu_wo_egg %>% 
  group_by(amphibian_life_stage, year) %>% 
  summarise(count = sum(amphibian_number))





A <- ggplot(data = ramu_wo_egg_sum, aes(x = year, y = count, pch = amphibian_life_stage)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.25,
              size = 2,
              color = "dark green") +
  labs(title = "Total mountain yellow-legged frog count in Sierra Nevada, 1997-2002",
       y = "Count",
       caption = 
"Figure 1. This graph shows the total counts of the endangered species, mountain yellow-legged\n frog, in Sierra Nevada from 1997 to 2002. 3 life stages are included.") +
  theme_minimal()





ramu_adu_subadu <- ramu_wo_egg %>% 
  filter(amphibian_life_stage %in% c("SubAdult", "Adult"))

ramu_adu_subadu_sum <- ramu_adu_subadu %>% 
  group_by(lake_id) %>% 
  summarise(count = sum(amphibian_number)) %>% 
  filter(lake_id %in% c("50183", "10223", "10329", "20196", "10225")) %>% # manually selected the top 5 lakes...
  mutate(lake_id = as.character(lake_id))





B <- ggplot(data = ramu_adu_subadu_sum, aes(x = lake_id, y = count)) +
  geom_col() +
  labs(title = "Top 5 lakes with highest counts of mountain yellow-legged frogs in Sierra\n Nevada, 1997-2002",
       y = "Count",
       x = "Lake ID",
       caption = "Figure 2. This graph shows the total counts of mountain yellow-legged frogs, from 1997 to 2002,\n found in the 5 lakes in Sierra Nevada with the highest number of the species. Adults and\n sub-adults are included in the counts.") +
  theme_minimal()





A / B

articles.title: And Then There Were None Text Analysis
articles.contents:
none_text <- pdf_text("and_then_there_were_none.pdf")





none_tidy <- data.frame(none_text) %>% # each line is a page
  mutate(text_full = str_split(none_text, pattern = "\\n")) %>% # add an additional \ # each line is an element in a page element
  unnest(text_full) %>% # each line has a line in the data frame
  mutate(text_full=  str_trim(text_full)) # trim off excess spaces


none_df <- none_tidy %>% 
  slice(-1) %>% 
  mutate(chapter = case_when(
    str_detect(text_full, pattern = "Chapter") ~ text_full, # if has Chapter, then repeat the value in column text_full
    TRUE ~ NA_character_ # if anything else is TRUE, then populate the new column with NA
  )) %>% 
  fill(chapter) %>% 
  separate(col = chapter, into = c("ch", "no"), sep = " ") %>% 
  mutate(chapter = as.numeric(no))

none_tokens <- none_df %>% 
  unnest_tokens(word, text_full) %>% # changing resolution from line to words
  dplyr::select(-none_text)

none_wordcount <- none_tokens %>% 
  count(chapter, word) # after this, want to exclude "stop words"





# remove stop words
none_nonstop_words <- none_tokens %>% 
  anti_join(stop_words) # telling r what we don't want to include in none_tokens

nonstop_count <- none_nonstop_words %>% 
  count(chapter, word)

# find top 5 words by chapter 
top_5_words <- nonstop_count %>% 
  group_by(chapter) %>% 
  arrange(-n) %>% 
  slice(1:5)

ggplot(data = top_5_words, aes(x = word, y = n)) +
  geom_col(fill = "#C74343") +
  facet_wrap(~chapter, scales = "free") +
  coord_flip() + 
  labs(x = "",
       y = "Number of occurrences",
       title = "Most Frequently Used Words in 'And Then There Were None' \nby Chapter",
       caption = "Christie, Agatha. 1939, And Then There Were None.") +
  theme_minimal()+
  theme(
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#39354F", colour = NA),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#515076", colour = NA),
    axis.text = element_text(color = "#F3CA24", size = 7),
    title = element_text(color = "#F3CA24", size = 13),
    panel.grid = element_line(color = "black"),
    strip.text = element_text(color = "#F3CA24"),
    plot.caption = element_text(size = 7))






# sentiment analysis
none_afinn <- none_nonstop_words %>% 
  inner_join(get_sentiments("afinn"))

afinn_counts <- none_afinn %>% 
  count(chapter, value)

afinn_means <- none_afinn %>% 
  group_by(chapter) %>% 
  summarize(mean_afinn = mean(value))

#ggplot(data = afinn_means, aes(x = chapter, y = mean_afinn)) +
#  geom_col(fill = "#C74343") +
#  coord_flip() +
#  labs(x = "Chapter",
#       y = "Mean sentiment value") +
#  theme_minimal() +
#  theme(
#    plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#39354F", colour = NA),
#    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#515076", colour = NA),
#    axis.text = element_text(color = "#F3CA24"),
#    title = element_text(color = "#F3CA24", size = 13),
#    panel.grid = element_line(color = "black"),
#    strip.text = element_text(color = "#F3CA24"))





none_nrc <- none_nonstop_words %>% 
  inner_join(get_sentiments("nrc"))

none_nrc_count <- none_nrc %>% 
  count(chapter, sentiment)

ggplot(data = none_nrc_count, aes(x = sentiment, y = n)) +
  geom_col(fill = "#C74343") +
  facet_wrap(~chapter) +
  coord_flip() + 
  labs(y = "Number of occurrences",
       x = "Sentiment",
       title = "Sentiment Analysis for 'And Then There Were None' \nby Chapter",
       caption = "Christie, Agatha. 1939, And Then There Were None.") +
  theme_minimal()+
  theme(
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#39354F", colour = NA),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#515076", colour = NA),
    axis.text = element_text(color = "#F3CA24", size = 7),
    title = element_text(color = "#F3CA24", size = 13),
    panel.grid = element_line(color = "black"),
    strip.text = element_text(color = "#F3CA24"),
    plot.caption = element_text(size = 7))
